titles.title: To provide for the proper classification of certain costumes and related accessories under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/10/2002--Introduced. Continues the current classification of certain costumes and related accessories under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States until Rubie's Costume Company v. United States is finally determined on appeal.
